content.rendered:
Our Residences

The Wintringham Residence

Sharing the sixth floor with the Bondfield Residence, The Wintringham is a spacious two bedroom apartment. The residence is cleverly divided with the bedrooms at one end and the living space and kitchen area at the other. The master bedroom has an en-suite with walk-in shower and the guest bedroom has an adjoining bathroom with walk-in shower. Both bedrooms look out across Buckingham Gate.

The fully fitted kitchen, complete with bar seating area, flows through to the open plan dining and sitting areas with enough space to entertain four people in comfort. Floor to ceiling windows with views over Vandon Street allow natural light to flood in and lend a light, bright, airy feel to the residence.

What's in your residence

Condé Nast Award Winning Two-bedroom residence housed on the 6th floor:

  • Open plan living and dining space
  • Outdoor planted terrace
  • Fully fitted kitchen with wine fridge and breakfast bar
  • Master bedroom, queen size bed, ensuite bathroom with walk in shower
  • Second bedroom, queen size bed, adjacent bathroom with walk in shower
  • Digital key room entry
  • Urban Apothecary in-room amenities

Please see below all our in-residences features and amenities.

T&C's: For residential bookings a minimum 2 night stay applies to our Wintringham Residence.

View Brochure Book
